talents.desc: Evasion grants a 62.5 point Shield for 5 seconds.
talents.name: Shadow Shield

talents.desc: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 13 (+2.5 per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.
talents.name: Immolation

talents.desc: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.
talents.name: First Aid

talents.desc: Charge to target unit, dealing 150 (+20 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
talents.name: The Hunt

talents.desc: Take 50% reduced damage from Abilities while Evasion is active.
talents.name: Sixth Sense

talents.desc: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
talents.name: Blood for Blood

talents.desc: Grants global range.
talents.name: Nowhere to Hide

talents.desc: Transforms into demon form at the target location. Deal 20 (+4 per level) damage in the area. Illidan gains 100 temporary max Health for each Hero hit and 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 18 seconds.
